text: Ðis is þara XXV hida landboc æt fifhidan ðe Eadgar cyng gebocede Gode and Sancta Marian in to Abbandune on ece yrfe.
Ðis synd þara XXV hida landgemæra to fifhidan ærest of eoccan on seortan dic of sceortan dic on ælfþryðe dic &lang dic on þæne mor.
Of þam more on ða ealdan dic of þære dic on temese streame on<../images/tbar.gif>riðig &lang riðiges on wase of wasan on cyddesige ofer rigedune on wattes wege.
Of þæm wege on mæne mor.
